name: Deflector Shield
desc: Shield will not overload but have a regenrate time %s/%s/%s/%s more than overload time, depending on hull size and allows the ship except fighter to dissipate hard flux at %s of the normal rate while shields are on.
short: Shield will not overload but need to regenerate instead and allows dissipation of hard flux while shields are up.

name: Redundant Shield Generators
desc: Reduces the amount of damage taken by shields by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size and increases flux capacity by %s.
short: Reduces damage taken by shields and increases flux capacity.

name: R-series Astromech Droids
desc: Increases engine and weapon repair speed by %s percent and decreases the amount of time the ship remains disabled by %s percent. Increases combat CR recovery and repair rate by %s percent.
short: Reduced overload time and increased repair speed

name: Beskar Armor Plating
desc: Increases the ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. Also reduces armor damage taken by %s.
short: Increases the ship's armo points and reduces armor damage taken.

name: Class 1 Hyperdrive
desc: Reduces  fuel use by %s and increases maximum burn level by %s.
short: Reduces fuel costs and increase max burn level.

name: Tibanna Gas Coolant
desc: Reduces weapons flux generation by %s and increases the ship's flux dissipation by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
short: Reduces energy weapons flux generation and increases flux dissipation.

name: Kyber Crystal Focus
desc: Increases damage dealt by energy weapons by %s and range of energy weapons by %s.
short: Increases the damge and range of energy weapons.

name: Advanced Targeting Computer
desc: All point defense weapons get the best possible target leading, damage to missiles and fighters is increased by %s.
short: Improves the accuracy of point defense weapons, increases damage to missiles and fighters.

name: Battle Droid Ship Crews
desc: Replaces ship crews with B1 Battle Droids, reduce ship crews requirement by %s. However, critial malfunction chance when low CR increases by %s.
short: Replaces ship crews with B1 Battle Droids. Risks of increase of critial malfunction chance when CR is low.

name: Jedi Commander
desc: Battle meditation used by the Jedi commander reduces CR use per second by %s percent and reduces critial malfunction chance by %s percent.
short: Battle meditation used by the Jedi commander improves the CR peformance of the ship.

name: Escape Pod
desc: Escape pods reduce crew loss upon ship destruction by %s percent.
short: Escape pods reduce crew loss when the ship is destroyed.

name: Capture Shuttle
desc: Sends out %s/%s/%s/%s capture shuttle(s), depending on hull size. Each has %s chance to make enemy ship to be able to salvage after combat.
short: Capture shuttle makes enemy ship capturable.

name: Base Delta Zero
desc: Base Delta Zero was the naval code to order the surface destruction of a planetary target by orbital bombardment. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s/%s/%s, depending on hull size, up to the total number of marines in the fleet. Reduces the fuel cost of orbital bombardment by %s.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids and reduces cost of bombardment.

name: Internal Dockyards
desc: The Mega-class Star Dreadnought was large enough to dock eight Resurgent-class Star Destroyers: six externally and two internally. It will deploy two from the internal dockyards to aid for battle.
short: Deploy two Resurgent-class Star Destroyers to aid for battle.
